summary: Completed testing of Boost System - All backend APIs working correctly, Frontend pages load and display boost types properly

design_issues.screen: Boost listing page with non-existent listing
issues: Dark background with low contrast 'Listing not found' text - hard to read

action_items: Improve error state display contrast on boost page for better readability
test_credentials: No authentication required for tested endpoints
context_for_next_testing_agent: Boost system integration is complete. Backend APIs at /api/boost/* all working. Credits page shows packages correctly. Boost listing page shows all 5 boost types (Homepage Spotlight, Featured Placement, Location Boost, Category Boost, Urgent Badge). Profile page has Credits & Boosts link at route /credits. My Listings page has Boost button (uses rocket icon). Authentication required for user-specific endpoints like /api/boost/credits/balance.
